h2_title: How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector
content: The Supreme Inspector is also able to turn its wings to solid gold and deflect your attacks. You can still do damage when this happens, but it'll be minimal. Bajie will explain to you that when this happens, it's best to wait until it spreads its wings again. Still, you should try to be as aggressive as you can while you have Bajie helping you in the first part of the fight. As always, try to reserve any Gourd usage while you have Bajie, as he'll often top up your health.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Supreme_Celestial_Inspector.md', within the main section titled 'Supreme Celestial Inspector', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
The Supreme Inspector is also able to turn its wings to solid gold and deflect your attacks. You can still do damage when this happens, but it'll be minimal. Bajie will explain to you that when this happens, it's best to wait until it spreads its wings again. Still, you should try to be as aggressive as you can while you have Bajie helping you in the first part of the fight. As always, try to reserve any Gourd usage while you have Bajie, as he'll often top up your health.
